intro_user_goals: As a user, what are your goals/objectives when commenting about a topic?
intro_experience: What do you feel contributes to a good experience for the users/discussion?
intro_valuable_comment: What makes a comment or contribution valuable?
intro_bad_comment: What makes a comment or contribution of poor quality, unconstructive or detrimental to the discussion?
intro_moderation_goals: As a user, what properties does a helpful moderator comment have?
